original_text: Other boats from Tiberias then arrived near to the place where all the people were. They had eaten the bread there after the Lord Jesus had thanked God for it.
korean_text: (그러나 디베랴에서 배들이 주께서 축사하신 후 여럿이 떡 먹던 그 곳에 가까이 왔더라)

sentences.original_text: Other boats from Tiberias then arrived
near to the place where all the people were
They had eaten the bread there
after the Lord Jesus had thanked God for it
sentences.korean_translation: 주 예수님께서 그것에 대해 감사 기도를 드리신 후에
